TrustedTypePolicyFactoryIsHTML.summary: The isHTML() method of the interface returns true if it is passed a valid object.

blockquote.para: The purpose of the functions isHTML(), , and is to check if the object is a valid TrustedType object, created by a configured policy.

TrustedTypePolicyFactoryIsHTML.returns: A {{jsxref("boolean")}} that is true if the object is a valid object.
